channel.title: Wodehouse on Elliot Snow-Kropla
channel.description: Recent content in Wodehouse on Elliot Snow-Kropla

item.title: Summer Lightning
item.description: A certain critic - for such men, I may regret to say, do exist - made the nasty remark about my last novel that it contained ‘all the old Wodehouse characters under different names’. He has probably now been eaten by bears, like the children who made mock of the prophet Elisha: but if he still survives he will not be to make a similar charge against Summer Lightning. With my superior intelligence, I have outgeneralled the man this time by putting in all the old Wodehouse characters under the same names. Pretty silly it will make him feel, I rather fancy.
